summary: Completed testing of QIRLLO School Management updates. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend has critical session persistence issues preventing proper navigation to admin pages. School branding updated correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Users get logged out immediately after login - cannot navigate to protected routes
affected_selectors: All protected admin, teacher, and parent routes

passed_tests: All backend APIs working (40/40 tests passed)
Login page displays 'Ogunwole Private School' correctly
Login authentication works (can authenticate with all user roles)
Frontend compiles without errors after fixing BulkUploadModal imports
Admin dashboard loads briefly before session loss
Parent dashboard loads briefly before session loss
Teacher dashboard loads briefly before session loss
User management APIs working (create teacher, create parent, delete user)
Bulk attendance, fees, and student management APIs functional
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend session persistence issue. Users can login but immediately get logged out when navigating to any protected route. This prevents testing of: 1) Admin attendance summary (view-only) 2) Students page bulk upload button 3) Fees page bulk upload button 4) User Management page at /admin/users 5) Parent attendance page with date range filter 6) Teacher attendance marking capability. The authentication/JWT token handling needs to be fixed for proper session management.
